p: SEM micrograph is indicated in Figure 6. The figure shows polydispersed nanoparticles with low agglomeration. The shape of the nanoparticles was observed to be spherical (73.37 at the 200 nm scale). Remya et al. obtained nanoscale silver with a size range of 25-51 nm using Cassia fistula flower extract [ 63]. The same type of results was reported in Acalypha indica- and Syzygium alternifolium-mediated syntheses of AgNPs [ 24, 64].
